name: Apocalypse Please
wikiSummary: Apocalypse Please is the second track on Absolution. The track features a heavy pounding drum loop, with a striking bass line and heavy piano chords. It featured very often in the 'Absolution Tour' either has a mid-way staple or an opener. The track is often regarded as setting the theme for the overall album.
